Sentencas: Today, effective and low-emission energy systems have been needed to combat environ-mental problems and to satisfy the growing energy requirement in a sustainable way.
Titulo: Thermodynamic and economic investigation of an innovative multigeneration plant integrated with the solar collector and combustion chamber

Sentencas: In this case, it has gained importance to the production of different useful commodities with the multigeneration plant that is obtained by integrating different systems.
Titulo: Thermodynamic and economic investigation of an innovative multigeneration plant integrated with the solar collector and combustion chamber

Sentencas: With this viewpoint, the key objective of this work is to design and analyze the solar collector and combustion chamber-assisted multigeneration model for power, heating, hydrogen, ammonia and freshwater generation.
Titulo: Thermodynamic and economic investigation of an innovative multigeneration plant integrated with the solar collector and combustion chamber

Sentencas: A newly designed plant comprises a gas turbine cycle, which includes a parabolic dish solar collector and combustion chamber, a Rankine power plant, a multi-effect desalination part, a hydrogen generation part, an ammonia generation part, and a solid oxide fuel cell unit.
Titulo: Thermodynamic and economic investigation of an innovative multigeneration plant integrated with the solar collector and combustion chamber

Sentencas: Comprehensive thermodynamic modeling, economic analysis and multiobjective optimization are executed to observe the performance of the whole plant and sub-system by employing energetic and exergetic approaches.
Titulo: Thermodynamic and economic investigation of an innovative multigeneration plant integrated with the solar collector and combustion chamber

Sentencas: Moreover, a parametric investigation is addressed to review the impacts of some important point changes on the modeled plant's efficiency.
Titulo: Thermodynamic and economic investigation of an innovative multigeneration plant integrated with the solar collector and combustion chamber

Sentencas: Analyses consequences display that the power and hydrogen generation amounts are 12,835 kW and 0.0607 kgs(-1).
Titulo: Thermodynamic and economic investigation of an innovative multigeneration plant integrated with the solar collector and combustion chamber

Sentencas: Also, freshwater generation capacity with desalination unit is computed as 4.89 kgs-1.
Titulo: Thermodynamic and economic investigation of an innovative multigeneration plant integrated with the solar collector and combustion chamber

Sentencas: Moreover, total cost rate of the modeled plant is computed as 1074 $/h.
Titulo: Thermodynamic and economic investigation of an innovative multigeneration plant integrated with the solar collector and combustion chamber

Sentencas: Finally, the evaluated plant's energetic and exergetic efficiency is 58.38% and 54.21%, respectively.
